string.name: STR_CHAT_TEST_FA_KR_GOSSIP
string.body: Testing--1, 2. Testing--1, 2.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_TempestElemental_El_55_Al_Start1
string.body: Curses to those who disturb the Current of Life.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_TempestElemental_El_55_Al_Skill1
string.body: Oh, Breath of Life, return to the embrace of Pazuzu!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_TempestElemental_El_55_Al_Die1
string.body: Finally... I can return to him...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_TempestElemental_El_55_Al_Die2
string.body: Pazuzu has finally... found a way to return...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Start1
string.body: None shall touch this artifact.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Start2
string.body: Your pathetic power won't get you to the artifact.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Skill1
string.body: You dare threaten me with attacks such as that!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Skill2
string.body: Creatures of Aether, come forth and help me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Skill3
string.body: Return to the flow of Aether, Daevas!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Skill4
string.body: Only death awaits those who intrude.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Die1
string.body: Ah... I must protect... the... Aion Tower...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingH_Wi_55_Al_Start1
string.body: You won't touch the artifact, no matter what happens!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingH_Wi_55_Al_Start2
string.body: Those who threaten the artifact shall be returned to the flow of Aether!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingH_Wi_55_Al_Skill1
string.body: Face the wrath of the protector!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingH_Wi_55_Al_Skill2
string.body: Only death awaits those who intrude.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingH_Wi_55_Al_Die1
string.body: I will curse you until the end...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingH_Wi_55_Al_Die2
string.body: Ah... The power, power of... Aion is...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanBoss_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Thou shalt all return to the Aether's flow!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanBoss_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Kneel before the might of the earth!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanBoss_55_Ah_Skill2
string.body: Thy bodies shalt become heavy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanBoss_55_Ah_Skill3
string.body: I will not be defeated by some lowly Daevas!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticElNamed_53_Ah_Start1
string.body: This shall be your grave.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticElNamed_53_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Face death, and despair.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticElNamed_53_Ah_Die1
string.body: Argh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticFiNamed_53_Ah_Start1
string.body: You shall not pass here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticFiNamed_53_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Face death, and despair.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticFiNamed_53_Ah_Die1
string.body: Argh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticAsNamed_53_Ah_Start1
string.body: How dare you come here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticAsNamed_53_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Off to the darkness, all of you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticAsNamed_53_Ah_Die1
string.body: Argh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_DrakanFiNamed_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: You fools. There is nowhere to run!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_DrakanFiNamed_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: The enemies are here.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_DrakanFiNamed_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Ugh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_OctacideNamed_54_Ah_Start1
string.body: Kwiii!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_OctacideNamed_54_Ah_Die1
string.body: Kwiii!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_NepilimEngineerNamed_54_Ah_Start1
string.body: I'll kill anyone who disturbs my work!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_NepilimEngineerNamed_54_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Oh no! I haven't finished the job yet...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_NepilimBoss_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Who dares seek out the Petralith?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_NepilimBoss_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Great Aion! Please forgive your poor servant...who has failed to fulfill his duties...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_NepilimNamed_54_Ah_Start1
string.body: You won't get past me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_NepilimNamed_54_Ah_Die1
string.body: No mercy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Kneel before me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Thou art not bad!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Ugh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_SpecterNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: There is nothing but bloody death for intruders.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_SpecterNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: No, I can't lose anything else.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_SpecterNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Urrrgh....

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_UnDrakanScNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Thou shalt not escape!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_UnDrakanScNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Ah...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_UnDrakanFiNightNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Thou shalt be my redemption.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_UnDrakanFiNightNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: We shall all be redeemed.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_UnDrakanFiNightNmd_55_Ah_Skill2
string.body: Tiamat's favor is with us!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_UnDrakanFiNightNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Ugh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiDayNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Thou shalt be my redemption.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiDayNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: We shall all be redeemed.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiDayNmd_55_Ah_Skill2
string.body: Tiamat's favor is with us!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiDayNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Ugh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_HugeSlimeNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Gurrrgle....

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_HugeSlimeNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Burp blerp...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_LichNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Fresh meat! Fresh meat!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_LichNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Come forth, my faithful servants!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_LichNmd_55_Ah_Skill2
string.body: Hurry and devour these foolish Daevas!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_LichNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Waagh!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_StDrakanFiNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Whoever ye may be, thou shalt not escape this curse.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_StDrakanFiNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Who dares despoil this holy place?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_StDrakanFiNmd_55_Ah_Skill2
string.body: My curse shall be upon thee!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ShadowStalker_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Something... has come...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ShadowStalker_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Rebirth... Rebirth... Rebirth...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ShadowStalker_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Bye... Bye... Bye...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_BonedrakeNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Thurzon the Undying assumes an attacking posture!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_BonedrakeNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Thurzon the Undying roars!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_BonedrakeNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Thurzon the Undying screams!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DeathNightNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: You shameful, dirty, cowardly dregs!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DeathNightNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Waugggh!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DeathNightNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Finally! I'm free of the curse! I'll never forget your kindness.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ElementalFireNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Time to incinerate!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ElementalFireNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Flarestorm begins to laugh wickedly!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ElementalFireNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Flarestorm lets out a shriek and disappears!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ShulackNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: You'll never get back home alive!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_Boss_Shulack_Knight_Skill1
string.body: Waaaaaaaah!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Shulack_IDCatacombs_1_Wakeup
string.body: You saved my life. Thank you very much!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanMonkBossNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: You stupid, foolish Daevas.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanMonkBossNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: The glory of Tiamat shalt spread across the world!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanMonkBossNmd_55_Ah_Leave1
string.body: Fools! Now dost thou understand the might of the Balaur?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanMonkBossNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: No! The seal! It must not break, or...!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: You think you're worthy of challenging me?!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Look upon me and despair!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Skill2
string.body: Hahaha! You cannot survive the dragon's curse!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Skill3
string.body: The storm will obliterate you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Skill4
string.body: You will learn the depths of despair.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Skill5
string.body: You vermin aren't worth my thunder.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: The storm... is eternal....

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_BrownieWa_NM_20_An_1_batk_b
string.body: Who are you? Do you have permission from master Hamerun?

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_BrownieWa_NM_20_An_2_batk_b
string.body: You won't come here, Daeva! Kakiti will stop you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_RatmanWa_NM_20_An_1_batk_b
string.body: I have no Odella to give to Daeva.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_RatmanWa_NM_20_An_2_batk_b
string.body: All Odella is for master Hamerun.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_BrowniePrisonWa_NM_20_An_1_batk_b
string.body: I shall not forgive you, Daeva, for getting in the way of master Hamerun!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_BrowniePrisonWa_NM_20_An_2_batk_b
string.body: Intruder! Protect master Hamerun!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_Hameroon_NM_20_An_1_batk_b
string.body: Aren't you a fearless one, to charge into Haramel like this!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_Hameroon_NM_20_An_2_batk_b
string.body: I won't hand over my precious treasures so easily!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_Hameroon_NM_20_An_3_batk_b
string.body: I will turn you into another one of my minions!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_Hameroon_NM_20_An_1_kcast2_b
string.body: My servants, attack the one who defiles Haramel!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_Hameroon_NM_20_An_2_kcast2_b
string.body: My worshippers! Attack the enemy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_kcast4_b
string.body: Children of Drakan... Give your blood to me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_kcast4_b
string.body: Young Drakan, aid the Dramata!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_kcast1_b
string.body: Feel the fury! Feel my pain and wrath!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_kcast1_b
string.body: Die! You should all die!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_kcast13_b
string.body: Death to you all...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_kcast13_b
string.body: I shall punish you with my power!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_die_b
string.body: It can't end... like this...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_die_b
string.body: I hate myself! I resent this cursed body of mine...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_3_die_b
string.body: I should have... Become a... Great dragon...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_kcast4_b
string.body: Oh, precious life... I will protect you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_kcast4_b
string.body: Do not touch my eggs!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_kcast1_b
string.body: My cry shall deafen your ears and blind your eyes!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_kcast1_b
string.body: Fear me! You must fear me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_kcast13_b
string.body: Be gone! Forever!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_kcast13_b
string.body: The earth will bind your feet.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_die_b
string.body: O Tiamat... Avenge me...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_die_b
string.body: My...my eggs...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_3_die_b
string.body: Avenge me... Drakan of Inggison...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_1_kcast1_b
string.body: Aid me, honorable warrior of Elysea!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_2_kcast1_b
string.body: All prayers to me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_3_kcast1_b
string.body: It is time for us to defeat the enemy! Give all your strength to me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_1_kcast2_b
string.body: Terror and death to the accursed intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_2_kcast2_b
string.body: Be terrified forever!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_3_kcast2_b
string.body: Pay the price with your lives!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_WonkiockFail_1
string.body: Still not enough! Prove your determination!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_WonkiockFail_2
string.body: Victory is nigh!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_1_die_b
string.body: Lord Kaisinel... please help us...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_2_die_b
string.body: It isn't over yet... Lord Kaisinel will come to our aid...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_1_kcast1_b
string.body: Help me, heroes of Asmodae!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_2_kcast1_b
string.body: Pray for victory!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_3_kcast1_b
string.body: We must stop the enemy! Give your strength to me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_1_kcast2_b
string.body: This is the end for the intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_2_kcast2_b
string.body: This is the end! Be gone!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_3_kcast2_b
string.body: The scale of victory has tipped to our side.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_WonkiockFail_1
string.body: Victory is close! Asmodians, show your strength!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_WonkiockFail_2
string.body: Pray harder! The enemy's end approaches!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_1_die_b
string.body: Is fate... giving up on me...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_2_die_b
string.body: Lord Marchutan! Please save us!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Hierarch_Patterns_01
string.body: Shhh. First give a prayer to Empyrean Lady Siel.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Hierarch_Patterns_02
string.body: Glory to Empyrean Lady Siel!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Hierarch_Patterns_03
string.body: Lady Siel, give me strength!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Hierarch_Patterns_04
string.body: And enlightenment to the foolish one!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2low_Key_PrisonGuards_38_An_1_Batk_S
string.body: Kromede has escaped!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2low_Key_PrisonGuards_38_An_1_Die_S
string.body: Ugh...is anybody there...?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2low_Key_GuardBoss_38_An_1_Batk_S
string.body: You have some guts coming out of there!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2low_Key_GuardBoss_38_An_1_kcast4_b
string.body: Damn it, master Kaliga has raised a Karnif pup.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2low_Key_GuardBoss_38_An_1_Die_S
string.body: Nevertheless...you won't be able to leave here alive...

string.name: STR_CHAT_Torture_Patterns_01
string.body: Heh, what do we have here? A new toy?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Torture_Patterns_02
string.body: What do you think of this new torture?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Torture_Patterns_03
string.body: Ugh...you will pay for this....

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2up_Key_Butler_38_An_1_Batk_S
string.body: You are an uninvited guest.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2up_Key_Butler_38_An_1_Die_S
string.body: Argh, I must inform my master that a guest has arrived....

string.name: STR_CHAT_Wife_Patterns_01
string.body: Oh my! Who are you? And how dare you stroll into my bedroom just like that!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Wife_Patterns_02
string.body: Why don't you try playing with my kids?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Wife_Patterns_03
string.body: Just wait. Once I let my husband know, you will be finished.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AssiJudge_Patterns_01
string.body: My skills are superior to yours!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AssiJudge_Patterns_02
string.body: Behold! This is my power!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AssiJudge_Patterns_03
string.body: You are undeniably strong....

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_01
string.body: How dare you come here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_02
string.body: This is precisely what those who seek to climb above themselves need!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_03
string.body: You have grown powerful, Kromede. But still not enough to contend with me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_04
string.body: I need to rest.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_05
string.body: Come forth, my children!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_06
string.body: You still have a long way to go. I will summon an opponent who will suit you perfectly.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_07
string.body: Damn it, I raised a Karnif pup!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_08
string.body: So, shall we start again, then?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_09
string.body: The real battle begins now.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AngryJudge_Patterns_01
string.body: You dare challenge me? How exciting!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AngryJudge_Patterns_02
string.body: This is my first judgment!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AngryJudge_Patterns_03
string.body: This is my second judgment!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AngryJudge_Patterns_04
string.body: Beg for forgiveness, before it's too late!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AngryJudge_Patterns_05
string.body: You fool! This is my last judgment!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_Raid_Nr_Patterns_01
string.body: Mmmmm.... Rumble....

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Raid_Nr_Patterns_01
string.body: Heh heh heh, I will destroy everything....

string.name: STR_CHAT_NPC_Robstin_Patterns_01
string.body: No, Kromede! Run!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip1
string.body: How's that Ingress coming along?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip2
string.body: The upper part is completed.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip3
string.body: We are running out of time. Hurry up and finish!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip4
string.body: Yes, master.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip5
string.body: The Reians must have been desperate to send you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip6
string.body: Nice try... but it won't work.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip7
string.body: I imprisoned Davlin, so this mansion is MINE!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip8
string.body: My golem will crush you and your pet Reians!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip9
string.body: You're better than I thought. Not that it will do you any good.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip10
string.body: That's it! No more pulling my punches!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip11
string.body: I'll teach you the price of provoking me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip12
string.body: This is what sets me apart from scum like you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip13
string.body: I'll finish this Huge Soul no matter what!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip14
string.body: You and your precious Reians will meet your doom!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedB_Skill1
string.body: Thou shalt come to grief!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedB_Skill2
string.body: I'll get rid of the cursed ones first!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedB_Die
string.body: My lord Surama... I.. am... sorry.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedC_Skill1
string.body: Power is... overflowing...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedC_Skill2
string.body: Arrggh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedC_Skill3
string.body: I'll... kill you all...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedC_Die
string.body: I need... more... Dragel...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedE_Idle
string.body: Useless!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedE_Skill1
string.body: Thy meddling shall cease!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedE_Skill2
string.body: Ha, fly little Daeva... if you can.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedE_Skill3
string.body: I'll show you what real power looks like!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedE_Die
string.body: It's a shame... I deceived even Tiamat... and now a mere Daeva...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE1_L_Boss_Skill1
string.body: This Crucible certainly has lowered its standards.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE1_L_Boss_Die
string.body: You're better than I thought.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R1_Skill1
string.body: Let's start with some basic skills.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R1_Die
string.body: At least you know the basics.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R1_Skill1
string.body: How about starting from the basics?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R1_Die
string.body: At least you know basic skills.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R2_Skill1
string.body: Once your enemy feels fear, the battle is half won.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R2_Die
string.body: You have nerves of steel.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R2_Skill1
string.body: Stay on your toes if you want to win.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R2_Die
string.body: You're good.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R3_Skill1
string.body: I won't pull my punches.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R3_Die
string.body: Excellent!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R3_Skill1
string.body: I won't pull my punches.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R3_Die
string.body: That's amazing.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R4_Skill1
string.body: I never thought you'd do so well.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R4_Die
string.body: Excellent.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R4_Skill1
string.body: I never thought you'd make it as far as me.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R4_Die
string.body: You're every bit as good as they said.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_Boss_Skill1
string.body: The Stigma encapsulates the power and minds of our ancestors.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_Boss_Skill2
string.body: You think you can take me with that tactic?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_Boss_Die
string.body: You make your family line proud.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_Boss_Skill1
string.body: The Stigma holds the memory of ancient warriors.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_Boss_Skill2
string.body: I expected more of you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_Boss_Die
string.body: You are very good at communicating with the Stigma.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE8_Boss_Skill1
string.body: Who are you Daevas?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE8_Boss_Skill2
string.body: I hope you all burn!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE8_Boss_Die
string.body: Why... why do we have to fight?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE10_Boss_Skill1
string.body: Who dared call me?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE10_Boss_Skill2
string.body: Your only option is death.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE10_Boss_Skill3
string.body: Pathetic. Funny, but pathetic.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE10_Boss_Skill4
string.body: Be gone!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE10_Boss_End
string.body: You have no idea... who I am.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE10_Boss_Die
string.body: I kept my bargain...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_Ranger_Broad
string.body: Here, over here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedA_Die
string.body: Thank you for freeing me from my Balaurean chains.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Unicorn_DramaticGossip1
string.body: Release me...from this curse.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Unicorn_DramaticGossip2
string.body: Release me...from this curse.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Unicorn_DisplayMsg1
string.body: The curse that binds Jurdin asserts itself.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Unicorn_DramaticGossip3
string.body: Thank you. You released me from my curse.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Unicorn_DramaticGossip4
string.body: Now I can...protect the forest...again.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE1_D_Boss_Skill1
string.body: This Crucible certainly has lowered its standards.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE1_D_Boss_Die
string.body: You're better than I thought.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S3_Elemeltal_CTRL_01
string.body: Welcome, Daeva. I am Administrator Arminos. The Empyrean Lords have made it clear that I am to assist you in your training.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S3_Elemeltal_CTRL_02
string.body: I feel my abilities could be better utilized in actual battle...but the lords know best...they say.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S3_Elemeltal_CTRL_03
string.body: I hope you'll liven things up here for me. And you'll be paid for your performance, of course.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S3_Elemeltal_CTRL_04
string.body: Let us see how you fare against my spirits... They are wild, bedeviling creatures, so watch your hide, Daeva.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S3_Elemeltal_CTRL_05
string.body: Well, well, well...that wasn't too bad. Might even call that interesting.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S4_Draky_CTRL_01
string.body: I'm glad you've returned. Last time was...rather disappointing.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S4_Draky_CTRL_02
string.body: This time your foes will be...more lively. They are Drakies under my command. The more you dispose of, the tastier the prize.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S4_Draky_CTRL_03
string.body: Shall we get started?

string.name: STR_CHAT_S4_Draky_CTRL_04
string.body: Wonderful! Simply wonderful! If you ever return, I think I will face you personally.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S6_Ghost_55_Ah_01
string.body: My word is stone, Daeva. We shall meet in battle.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S6_Ghost_55_Ah_02
string.body: I bid you caution...even I cannot control them at times.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S6_Ghost_55_Ah_03
string.body: I am disappointed, Daeva. I thought, perhaps, I had finally found someone who could keep me...entertained.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S6_Ghost_55_Ah_04
string.body: Hahaha...this is terrific fun!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Ab1_IDAbRe_Info_Jemini_L_01
string.body: Is it true that there is a way to infiltrate the fortress, even if you fail to capture it?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Ab1_IDAbRe_Info_Nigos_D_01
string.body: Do you want to find out how to infiltrate the fortress, even if you fail to capture it?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Perento_A_01
string.body: Daeva, please take the gift I've prepared for the 200th day.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Perento_A_02
string.body: Did you take the gift that I've prepared?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Perento_A_03
string.body: I've brought it especially for you, Daeva.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_A_01
string.body: Daeva, please take the gift I've prepared for the 200th day.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_A_02
string.body: Did you take the gift that I've prepared?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_A_03
string.body: I've brought it especially for you, Daeva.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Perento_B_01
string.body: It's nice to talk to the Daevas after such a long time.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Perento_B_02
string.body: The Brigade General was deeply moved by all of you.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Perento_B_03
string.body: I wonder how the Elyos members from the Israphel server--Dream, Ear, Honey, Ryo, Temi, Madoin--are doing. They are the ones who have captured Tahabata for the first time in all servers.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_B_01
string.body: It's nice to talk to the Daevas after such a long time.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_B_02
string.body: I would like to have a pleasant conversation with The First Fortress Commander on all servers, Israphel Server Dux--please offer my regards.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_B_03
string.body: And if I recall,Siel Server Rhythmic was the first max level user on all servers, right?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_B_04
string.body: And I wonder how Inbread, Baba, Raerbear, Godlife, Waffles, and Uwu are doing--the ones who captured Kromede for the first time on all servers.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Perento_C_01
string.body: I am so happy to have so many Daevas who have shared memories with me!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Perento_C_02
string.body: I hope you all obtain Hero-level items and feel as excited and fulfilled as I am.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Perento_C_03
string.body: I hope all of you will succeed in getting your items enchanted with my gifts!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_C_01
string.body: I am so happy to have so many Daevas who have shared memories with me!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_C_02
string.body: I hope you all obtain Hero-level items and feel as excited and fulfilled as I am.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_C_03
string.body: I hope all of you will succeed in getting your items enchanted with my gifts!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTiamatLab_War_Prisoner_01
string.body: Oh, God! I made it!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTiamatLab_War_Prisoner_02
string.body: Thank you...! I'm free!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTiamatLab_War_Prisoner_03
string.body: You're my savior!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTiamatLab_War_Prisoner_04
string.body: I thought I was going to die here

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDArena_PvE_Party_Close_D
string.body: I heard that the Crucible Coliseum has been shut down, and training isn't available right now. I can't stand it!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDArena_PvE_Party_Close_L
string.body: The Crucible Coliseum has been shut down. We have people on the way

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDArena_PvE_Solo_Close_D
string.body: The Crucible Coliseum has been shut down. I couldn't even finish my training!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDArena_PvE_Solo_Close_L
string.body: The Crucible Coliseum is closed? But there's only one level left

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_Q_DrakanLab_Wi_50_An_Skill_Start
string.body: I didn't think you'd get this far

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_Q_DrakanLab_Wi_50_An_Skill_1
string.body: Can't report if you're dead!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_Q_DrakanLab_Wi_50_An_Skill_2
string.body: You won't live to tell anyone!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_Q_DrakanLab_Wi_50_An_Skill_3
string.body: The truth of what happened here will die with you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_Q_DrakanLab_Wi_50_An_Skill_4
string.body: You're a stubborn one!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_Q_DrakanLab_Wi_50_An_Die
string.body: Argh! Tiamat... will... rise...!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_War_BionicCPUNamed_50_Ah_Start
string.body: Warning. Unauthorized user. 3, 2, 1...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_War_BionicCPUNamed_50_Ah_Skill_1
string.body: Defense mode initiated.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_War_BionicCPUNamed_50_Ah_Skill_2
string.body: All systems locked.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_War_BionicCPUNamed_50_Ah_Die
string.body: Recovery impossible. Initiate emergency shutdown.

string.body: Objective complete. Artifact experiment: successful.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDTiamatLab_Q_Mission_03
string.body: Destroying all stored documents.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDTiamatLab_Q_Mission_04
string.body: Objective complete. Time project: successful.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Event_Chuseok_IDLF1_Rabbit_55_Ae_01
string.body: Bunnies eat songpyeon too, you know!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Event_Chuseok_IDLF1_Rabbit_55_Ae_02
string.body: Give me songpyeon and no one gets hurt!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_300_LOCATION_L_01
string.body: It's already been 300 days since the launch of Aion Classic? This calls for a celebration!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_300_LOCATION_L_02
string.body: Has it been that long already?

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_300_LOCATION_L_03
string.body: Time sure flies!

string.body: It's already been 300 days since the launch of Aion Classic? This calls for a celebration!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_300_LOCATION_D_02
string.body: Has it been that long already?

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_300_LOCATION_D_03
string.body: Time sure flies!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_300_LOCATION_L_04
string.body: Let's do the 300-day anniversary dance together!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_300_LOCATION_D_04
string.body: Let's do the 300-day anniversary dance together!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_300_LOCATION_L_05
string.body: I hope everyone enjoys the 300-day anniversary cake!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_300_LOCATION_D_05
string.body: I hope everyone enjoys the 300-day anniversary cake!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_300_LOCATION_L_06
string.body: Let's toast to the 300-day anniversary!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_300_LOCATION_D_06
string.body: Let's toast to the 300-day anniversary!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_300_LOCATION_L_07
string.body: Welcome. Are you enjoying the 300-day anniversary party? I heard there is a 300-day celebration going on in the big cities. Here's your last 300-day anniversary reward.

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_300_LOCATION_D_07
string.body: Welcome. Are you enjoying the 300-day anniversary party? I heard there is a 300-day celebration going on in the big cities. Here's your last 300-day anniversary reward.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Drakan_Runner01_Q_55_An_01
string.body: I'm revealed...die!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Drakan_Runner01_Q_55_An_02
string.body: Krr...!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Drakan_Runner02_Q_55_An_01
string.body: Can't die like this...!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Drakan_Runner02_Q_55_An_02
string.body: You will never find me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_01
string.body: Would Daeva like to play a game, nyerk?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_02
string.body: Daeva, come play!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_03
string.body: This is all optional, of course....

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_04
string.body: Shugo never forced Daeva to come here, nyerk!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_05
string.body: You've been caught by the Black Rabbit!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_06
string.body: Poppy-poppy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_07
string.body: Green light...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_08
string.body: Red light!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_09
string.body: Each of your choices may bring good or ill fortune.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_10
string.body: Don't just rely on what you see.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_11
string.body: Trust your gut.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_12
string.body: We never force you to do anything. The choices are yours to make.

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_WEBTOON_L_01
string.body: There is a new webtoon where the history of Aion unfolds. If you want to learn more about Atreia's past, visit Bufftoon.

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_WEBTOON_L_02
string.body: For the glory of Empyrean Lord Nezekan!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_WEBTOON_L_03
string.body: You can read Aion webtoons at Bufftoon.

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_WEBTOON_L_04
string.body: There is a special event running on the Bufftoon Event page.

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_WEBTOON_L_05
string.body: Click the cart and get a buff.

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_WEBTOON_D_01
string.body: This cart is very special. Click it, and it will give you a buff.

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_WEBTOON_D_02
string.body: Go check out the special event at Bufftoon.

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_WEBTOON_D_03
string.body: For the glory of Empyrean Lord Triniel!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_WEBTOON_D_04
string.body: Search for Aion webtoons at Bufftoon. You'll find many interesting stories there.

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_WEBTOON_D_05
string.body: An Aion webtoon has been released. It illustrates numerous historical moments and events you've experienced in Aion. You can find it at Bufftoon.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Ticket_Win
string.body: Shugo lost?! Fine, here is ticket, nyerk.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Ticket_Lose
string.body: Shugo wins, akakakak! No ticket for Daeva!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_M_Win
string.body: Ugh, I lost. Here's your marble.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_M_Lose
string.body: I won! Hand it over!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_F_Win
string.body: I lost?! Here's the marble, as promised.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_F_Lose
string.body: Hm, looks like I won. Where's my marble?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_ShugoM_Win
string.body: Noooo, Daeva wins! Take shugo's marble.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_ShugoM_Lose
string.body: YAY, shugo wins! Hand over the marble, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_ShugoF_Win
string.body: Here's shugo's marble, nyerk....

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_ShugoF_Lose
string.body: Shugo will take Daeva's marbles, nyerk!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage_Pass
string.body: Wait a moment for the next game, nyerk.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_WORLD_EVENT_20TH_Need_Ticket
string.body: You have no Lottery ticket.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_WORLD_US_QOOQOO_1_N_01
string.body: The delightful taste of Vinna could even wake the dead!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_WORLD_US_QOOQOO_1_N_02
string.body: Give me the Vinna and no one gets hurt!

string.body: The exit is over there, if Daeva is a coward....

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Out_2
string.body: Tickets cannot be refunded, so keep that in mind, nyerk!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_Qooqoo_1
string.body: Catch me if you can, cuckoo!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_Qooqoo_2
string.body: Cuckoo, squawk! Cuckoo! Cooo!

string.body: Ca... Cantapia!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_Pernos_02
string.body: Ka... Kangaroo!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage5_Pass
string.body: One Daeva passed, nyerk!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_L_M
string.body: I used to play this marble game a lot.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_L_F
string.body: What? You wanna take me on? You got it!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_D_M
string.body: Give me all your marbles!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_D_F
string.body: I need marbles

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_ShugoM
string.body: How about playing a game with shugo, nyerk?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_ShugoF
string.body: How is Daeva at the marble game?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage3_Manager_01
string.body: If Daeva's collected all 20 marbles, come back and see shugo, nyerk.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage3_Manager_02
string.body: People often drop or hide marbles. So, look for them carefully.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage3_Manager_03
string.body: By the way, where is Player 0 hiding?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage3_Manager_04
string.body: Better hurry up, nyerk!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage5_Manager_01
string.body: Rewards are given on a first come, first served basis.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage5_Manager_02
string.body: Latecomers get nothing, nyerk!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDDF3_Boss_DrakanFiBossD_55_Ah_01
string.body: Anyone there? Hello?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Solo_Undercover_NPC_01
string.body: I'm going to report the data I gathered. Good luck!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_event_kina_quest_01
string.body: Thanks for the exchange, nyerk!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_event_kina_quest_02
string.body: Daeva didn't bring enough crystals, nyerk!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDArena_PvE_Party_Open_D

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_Tiamat_01
string.body: You insects! You've come further than I thought But this ends here!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_Tiamat_02
string.body: I will destroy everything here!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_Tiamat_03
string.body: Yes! Come, obey your Dragon Lord!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_Tiamat_04
string.body: This is my throne! Proof of my reign... I have no time for such worthless games.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_Tiamat_05
string.body: I... am... the Dragon Lord! There is no land, no future where you can stand against me! And STILL, you...!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_Anuhart_01
string.body: Do you think that you've won? I build my own future!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_Anuhart_02
string.body: I will bury you all!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_Anuhart_03
string.body: Believe what you wish about fate! You will never find her!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_Anuhart_04
string.body: Lord Tiamat... The future you desire... I...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_Samael_01
string.body: Trespassing Daevas will all be eliminated. Executing mission.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_Samael_02
string.body: Take this!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_Samael_03
string.body: I also...wanted to be saved...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_Samael_04
string.body: But why? Oh, Lord Tiamat, I...!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_Samael_05
string.body: No! That's impossible! I must eliminate all these vicious Daevas...!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_Samael_06
string.body: I'll eliminate all that disturb me!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_Tiamat_Barrier_01
string.body: You have not earned the right to set foot up here yet.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_EVENT_BLACK_RABBIT_50
string.body: (Sob)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDF4Re_Solo_Evileye_Alert_55_An_01
string.body: Warning! Warning!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_EVENT_LDF4_HUMAN_01
string.body: Hrasasasasasasasasa

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_EVENT_Shugo_Bead_FAIL_01
string.body: Not enough materials, nyerk!!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_01
string.body: Feel the power of Phaistos, Raden's masterpiece!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_02
string.body: Die, you worms!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_03
string.body: The ascended power guides me!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_04
string.body: I shall show you all!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_05
string.body: Siel's Power is mine!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_06
string.body: Come on now! Come out and do something!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_07
string.body: This is the power of Phaistos, the ultimate weapon!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_08
string.body: Tik tok, tik tok...Time's passing.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_09
string.body: This is going to tingle.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_10
string.body: If only I had more time and money!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_11
string.body: My research is complete!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_12
string.body: I am Raden, the one who surpassed the limits of the Daeva and became the new creator!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_13
string.body: You will never reach my level!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_14
string.body: The Empyrean Lord was unable to save me. What saved me in the end is my own power!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_15
string.body: Do not think that Apheta Beluslan is the end. My research is still in progress in other lands... Hehehe.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_16
string.body: Serves you right for underestimating me, Daeva scum!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_17
string.body: Try blocking this power of the Empyrean Lord which saves you.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_18
string.body: You useless trash! Try something, anything!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_19
string.body: Worship this overwhelming power!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_20
string.body: Kneel before this overwhelming power! Before my greatness, which commands it!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_21
string.body: You'll be unable to move. Hahahaha!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_22
string.body: I won't give you a moment's rest!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_23
string.body: Crumble under the blistering stream!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_24
string.body: Tear apart in the howling winds!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_25
string.body: How!? My research is Aaaagh!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDPHAISTOS_Phaistos_26
string.body: Have you realized now? You fools! Hahaha!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_DrakanMirrorNmd_Gossip1
string.body: A prisoner willingly walking into the interrogation room? Glorious!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_DrakanMirrorNmd_Gossip2
string.body: The last illusion! Now be gone!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_DrakanMirrorNmd_Gossip3
string.body: The illusion never dies, only fades

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_DrakanFiremage_Nmd_Gossip1
string.body: The guilty hath come for their punishment!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_DrakanFiremage_Nmd_Gossip2
string.body: Revel in the flames of death!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_DrakanFiremage_Nmd_Gossip3
string.body: O, the spirit of flame!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_DrakanFiremage_Nmd_Gossip4
string.body: For the glory of the Raksha Legion!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_58_Gossip1
string.body: ou Daevas must have come to celebrate my resurrection. Hahaha...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_58_Gossip2
string.body: Earth, arise! Thy master wills it!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_58_Gossip3
string.body: Earth and stone, vanquish them!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_58_Gossip4
string.body: I've quelled my anger for thousands of years! Now to fight!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_58_Gossip5
string.body: I've just woken up. I can't die like this

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_57_Gossip1
string.body: I've been waiting so long!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_57_Gossip2
string.body: Earth, arise! Thy master wills it!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_57_Gossip3
string.body: Earth and stone, vanquish them!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_57_Gossip4
string.body: I've quelled my anger for thousands of years! Now to fight!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_Raksha_Nmd_57_Gossip5
string.body: I've just woken up. I can't die like this

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_0F_Envoy_Nmd_Gossip1
string.body: I have no time to spare for foolish Daevas

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_0F_Envoy_Nmd_Gossip2
string.body: I see you want to witness this hell, too!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_2F_Envoy_Nmd_Gossip1
string.body: Thou shalt rue thy curiosity!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_3F_Envoy_Nmd_Gossip1
string.body: Thou hast slain a loyal servant of Tiamat! Thy foolishness hast reached its peak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_5F_1_Envoy_Nmd_Gossip1
string.body: You Daevas hath come too far. Enough of this!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_5F_2_Envoy_Nmd_Gossip1
string.body: You shouldn't have come here... You've brought death upon yourself!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRaksha_5F_2_Envoy_Nmd_Gossip2
string.body: My Lord Tiamat, I have completed the mission.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_PHAISTOS_01
string.body: Invader spotted.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_PHAISTOS_02
string.body: Damage rate at 99.9%. Ceasing all functions.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_PHAISTOS_03
string.body: Intruders will be eliminated at all costs.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_PHAISTOS_04
string.body: Final objective. Permanent annihilation.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_PHAISTOS_05
string.body: Cutting off target's visuals.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_PHAISTOS_06
string.body: Target elimination failed. Preparing attack per stage.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_PHAISTOS_07
string.body: Changing stage. Adjusting attack level.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_PHAISTOS_08
string.body: Sealing predicted attack action.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_PHAISTOS_09
string.body: Changing predictions. Expanding attack range.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_PHAISTOS_10
string.body: Entering final stage. Target's chance of survival is 1%.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_PHAISTOS_11
string.body: Emergency. Charging attack to current maximum output.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_01
string.body: Cunning Daevas! You dare approach me again?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_02
string.body: Ah... Edwige... Sarakael, I miss you...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_03
string.body: You inferior beings have no right to live!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_04
string.body: I have become, stronger...!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_05
string.body: You will never see the light of this world again...!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_06
string.body: I have been chosen by Lord Tiamat! Not as a mere Daeva, but as a more evolved being...!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_07
string.body: Will your attacks even matter?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_08
string.body: You'll all die anyway...!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_09
string.body: Urgh, it hurts...! It hurts too much...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_10
string.body: You must feel all the pain that I have felt!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_11
string.body: Taste the most excruciating pain...!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_12
string.body: This is all your fault...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_13
string.body: I have been made stronger than anybody else!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_14
string.body: This is the end!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_15
string.body: I am superior, better than... you all...!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_16
string.body: I will make you writhe in your helplessness.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_17
string.body: Now, try enduring this!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_18
string.body: To worthless Daevas... Argh...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_19
string.body: Nobody will save me... Then I must! Become stronger! By my own hand...!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_20
string.body: You already know... don't you? This accursed world... The hypocrisy of the Empyrean Lords!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_21
string.body: I will crush you all!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_22
string.body: This is the ultimate power I have obtained! Take this!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_23
string.body: Mere ordinary Daeva! I'll make you never dare to face me again!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTartaros_h_MainSamael_24
string.body: You cannot save anything! That's how insignificant you are!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_01
string.body: Wait! I surrender!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_02
string.body: We need...to get out of here first...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_03
string.body: Was that... Lord Kumanka..? Let's ask him for help...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_04
string.body: I can't...go...any further...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_05
string.body: Eliminate all the worthless trash!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_06
string.body: Watch out! Did you get hurt?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_07
string.body: Where am I? Why...am I here?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_08
string.body: All hail the almighty Dragon Lords!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_09
string.body: Oh, please! Please don't abandon me!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_10
string.body: Take mercy so that I may be able to go to the Paradise of Honor...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_11
string.body: If there is a hell, this is it! Mwahaha!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_12
string.body: Leave...now! Hurry!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_13
string.body: Your worthless generation only knows how to fail.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_14
string.body: You are all tools, simple and crude.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_15
string.body: You dare to think a mere recruit like you can become a Daeva again? You belong to the Balaur now!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_16
string.body: I'll wait for you to come back.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_17
string.body: An intruder! There's an intruder!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_18
string.body: Leave this place to me and go seek cover!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_19
string.body: Just this left...!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_20
string.body: I'll be waiting here for you.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_WildCard_FAIL_01
string.body: Wild Card not learned.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_WildCard_FAIL_02
string.body: Wild Card could not be activated.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_Q_001
string.body: Atmospheric analysis 50% complete. Please collect measurements from other regions for accurate results.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_Q_002
string.body: Limited readings in this region. Please move to a higher altitude for more accurate results.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_Q_003
string.body: Atmospheric analysis 99% completeUnexpected variable found nearby. Inspection is required.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_Q_004
string.body: Variable spotted. Abnormal value. Atmospheric analysis 100%...complete.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_Q_005
string.body: Need...more...black tears...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_Q_006
string.body: Lord Apsu! Lord Jemanat! I shall await your revivals...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_Q_007
string.body: A power as black as the night shall be our salvation!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_Q_008
string.body: Don't do that!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_Q_009
string.body: Sorry, okay? Ehem, I mean, I'm sorry...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_Q_010
string.body: Now! Run!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_Q_011
string.body: (Extra Gossip)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_Q_012
string.body: (Extra Gossip)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_Q_013
string.body: (Extra Gossip)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_Q_014
string.body: (Extra Gossip)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_21
string.body: Thank you, friend... I'll miss you...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_22
string.body: Try to stay positive... for all of us.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_23
string.body: Who's making a ruckus?!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_24
string.body: Hmph! I could've won!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDLDF1_01_Q_25
string.body: (Extra Gossip)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDFist_Jagi_01
string.body: Hey you! Say my name!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDFist_Jagi_02
string.body: You fool! It's over once I win!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDFist_Jagi_03
string.body: Please...please stop! I beg you!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDFist_Heart_01
string.body: No! Don't run!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDFist_Heart_02
string.body: Owwww!!!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDFist_Heart_03
string.body: Anytime!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDFist_Heart_04
string.body: Ow ow ow! Stop it!!!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDFist_Heart_05
string.body: You meanieeee!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_treasure_Shugo_01
string.body: A treasure box will appear soon, nyerk! Finders keepers!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_treasure_Shugo_02
string.body: Anyone just take it!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_Supply_Guide_NPC
string.body: Kind Daeva, please help us distribute our supplies!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Baseball_01
string.body: Winding up!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Baseball_02
string.body: Take my speedball!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Baseball_03
string.body: Don't balk from my ball!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Baseball_04
string.body: It'll hurt more than a homerun swing...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Baseball_05
string.body: Owww...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LC1_Theurus
string.body: Hmmm

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_DC1_Loptr
string.body: Hmmm

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF10_Dra_02_DrakanRa_Named_60_Ah_01
string.body: Take this! Lord Diad's cursed arrow never misses!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF10_Dra_02_DrakanRa_Named_60_Ah_02
string.body: Who'll be the first to go!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF10_Dra_02_DrakanRa_Named_60_Ah_03
string.body: I shall return...for Lord Diad...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF10_Dra_02_DrakanRa_Named_60_Ah_04
string.body: How insolent! I will deal with you myself!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DYE_XMAS_PENGUIN_01
string.body: I came since someone has to deliver presents for Solorius!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DYE_XMAS_PENGUIN_02
string.body: Come take your Solorius gifts!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_ArcDrakanMaster_60_Ah_L_01
string.body: Delirium will always roil.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_ArcDrakanMaster_60_Ah_L_02
string.body: Hmph! How can you control others when you cannot control yourself?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_ArcDrakanMaster_60_Ah_L_03
string.body: Your own self-doubt will strangle you to death.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_ArcDrakanMaster_60_Ah_L_04
string.body: Argh! Your resistance is useless!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_ArcDrakanMaster_60_Ah_L_05
string.body: Accept it! Submitting to me is the only way forward.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_ArcDrakanMaster_60_Ah_L_06
string.body: So long as there is weakness, delirium will persist.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_01
string.body: Let the power of illusion become my fortitude!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_02
string.body: No magic shall pass.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_03
string.body: Stand back, you monsters!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_04
string.body: Thank you. Let me heal your wound to repay the debt.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_05
string.body: Thank you, Daeva. Let me recover your mind and body as recompense for your help.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_06
string.body: Thank you, Daeva. Since you helped me, I will turn back time so you can use all your powers again.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_07
string.body: May the blessings of Lord Marchutan be with you.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_08
string.body: May the blessings of Lord Kaisinel be with you.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_09
string.body: Until death close our eyes, we shall be eternal.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_10
string.body: I shall grow stronger with the power of splendor!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_11
string.body: I shall grow stronger with the power of darkness!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_12
string.body: So long as darkness exists, splendor will persist.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_13
string.body: So long as splendor exists, darkness will persist.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_14
string.body: I'll cast an Illusion Ward with the Illusion Shards you gathered!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_15
string.body: I'll cast a powerful Illusion Ward with the Illusion Shards you gathered!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_16
string.body: May the Light of Ariel embrace you.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_17
string.body: May the Darkness of Azphel destroy your enemies.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_18
string.body: I shall destroy everything in this tower!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_19
string.body: The power of illusion is not easily earned.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_20
string.body: Nothing can defeat me!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_21
string.body: Fake Data Test 21

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_22
string.body: Fake Data Test 22

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_23
string.body: Fake Data Test 23

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_24
string.body: Fake Data Test 24

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDINFINITY_SOLO_NPC_Gossip_25
string.body: Fake Data Test 25

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_WildCard_FAIL_03
string.body: No Wild Card in possession.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDragon_twin_boss_01
string.body: Combat Start

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDragon_twin_boss_02
string.body: I will melt you to nothingness.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDragon_twin_boss_03
string.body: My soul is not just one

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDragon_twin_boss_04
string.body: Try again.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Warrior_01
string.body: Confess to thy sins!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Warrior_02
string.body: Twas it...a faraway dream..?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Warrior_03
string.body: Begone, wicked fetter of ill fate!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Warrior_04
string.body: Despair at your helplessness!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Warrior_05
string.body: My spear and I shall now become one!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Warrior_06
string.body: My blows shall rain like hail upon thee!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Warrior_07
string.body: Come to me, my servants!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Haechi_01
string.body: Stand back!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Haechi_02
string.body: Ah... Peace, at last...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Haechi_03
string.body: Feel my pain!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Haechi_04
string.body: Arghh! Go away!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Haechi_05
string.body: No..! Not...yet!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_RedDevil_01
string.body: Hmmmm. Do I smell acorn jelly?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_RedDevil_02
string.body: What good is anything after death?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Jangseung_01
string.body: On the honor of the broad sky!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Jangseung_02
string.body: On the honor...of the broad sky...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Jangseung_03
string.body: On! The honor! Of the broad! Sky!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Jangseung_04
string.body: On...the honor...of the broad sky...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF10_Supply2_Guide_NPC
string.body: I am looking for a brave Daeva who will deliver the supplies despite the risks!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Warrior_08
string.body: You shall kneel at my sword's mercy!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Warrior_09
string.body: My spear shall sing vengeance!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Warrior_10
string.body: Here a flower withers, bereft of full bloom...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Warrior_11
string.body: Come to me, my servants!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_MirrorGhost_01
string.body: Oh no...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_MirrorGhost_02
string.body: Look...away! Don't look at me!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_MirrorGhost_03
string.body: The moonlight...is blinding...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_WaterGhost_01
string.body: Take me with you!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_WaterGhost_02
string.body: Don't leave me here...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_JanggiGhost_01
string.body: You dare lecture me!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_JanggiGhost_02
string.body: Ah, checkmate. I surrender...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Reaper_01
string.body: Hear me, owner of the name...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_Reaper_02
string.body: So the name meant to be called...was mine.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_MirrorGhost_04
string.body: Did... Did I hear that right?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_MirrorGhost_05
string.body: Wh-what is that sound?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_BuckwheatJelly_01
string.body: Something is missing from the table.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_JanggiGhost_03
string.body: The suspicious energy is gone now.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDDokkaebi_NPC_01
string.body: I've got no more acorn jelly.
